roleset.name: remove covering
roleset.note: DENUDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'denude' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.6, Framenet entry Emptying. (from denude.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: He-1 also launched a kingside storm, [*-1]-2 sacrificing a pawn [*-2]to denude D.T.'s king.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: enormous number of sheep in the country surrounding the park have nearly denuded it of trees and grass
example.arg: enormous number of sheep in the country surrounding the park
